page.title: 11 Otley Primary School,Otley
page.content: Otley County Primary School is a village school with three classes.These are called Infant,Transition and Junior.One class is on the edge of the school field in a portacabin while the other two are in the main building.Attached to the school is the Under Fives Centre,they meet in their own portacabin.There is a large field and a hard playground marked out for several games.Children start school before they are five and stay at Otley until they are ten,then they go to the Middle school in Woodbridge.All the children stay at school at lunch time and most of them bring sandwiches.During the lunch time several clubs are held,these include recorder,country-dancing and piano. Every monday the oldest children go to Ipswich for a swimming lesson.
